views.markdown:
Supports iOS 11, 12 and 13





Set your phone to automatically answer to specific number, FaceTime calls and all other CallKit apps (Viber, Skype, WhatsApp etc). It can be used for unattended videoConference, baby monitoring, answering when driving and even have it switch automatically to speaker or bluetooth.

AutoAnswer X lets you choose numbers that you wish to auto-pickup and your phone will automatically answer the incoming call from those numbers, either instantly or after the amount of seconds you specify.

-Specify.
-Auto-answer.
-Specify numbers to auto-answer.
-Specify call types(Telephony,Facetime Audio or Video,other CallKit apps).
-Specify whether toupon answering a call.
-Specify whether to automatically connect toupon answering a call.
-device's camera(on a FaceTime Video call).
-(for e.g. baby monitoring or receiving calls while in a business meeting).
-All settings can be assigned eitheror.

-AutoAnswer X can be used for:
-
- Auto-answering specific numbers
- Auto-answering while using your phone with a
- Instant response to
-(by leaving an iPhone in your place and call it via FaceTime, keeping a constant connection).
